title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Enhancing Science Teaching Methodology Competency

context.prior_knowledge: General understanding of basic scientific knowledge and educational experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-based, practice-oriented curriculum for undergraduate students preparing for science careers, combining microlearning modules with activity-based learning for a flexible environment

learning_goals: Learners can apply theory-practice integration strategies with 80% or higher accuracy when designing activity-based science lessons.
Learners evaluate peers' science education materials and provide improvement suggestions at least three times via peer review.
Learners create and present three or more microteaching video scenarios in mobile environments.
Learners systematically organize their science education competencies through instructional design documents included in personal portfolios.

resources: Digital content creation tools (e.g., Canva, VideoScribe)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
